org.smtlib

Class Log.StandardListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.smtlib.Log.StandardListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Log.IListener
    Enclosing class:
    Log

    public class Log.StandardListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements Log.IListener
    This class logs to the standard PrintStreams out and diag. The class is not static so that it can see out and diag in the containing class; it needs to do this so that changes to out and diag are reflected here as well.
